metadata.title: CVE-2021-39240 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HAProxy 2.2 before 2.2.16, 2.3 before 2.3.13, and 2.4 before 2.4.3. It does not ensure that the scheme and path portions of a URI have the expected characters. For example, the authority field (as observed on a target HTTP/2 server) might differ from what the routing rules were intended to achieve.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.9-1ubuntu0.1').
